metadata.othernotes:
Overview

- Okino is a programming/general technology prodigy brought up during the 2090s-2100s. He's the one who built the sentinels to fight against the kaiju, despite being a teenager at the time.

- He eventually had to time travel to the year 1945, where he must disguise himself as a girl called Kiriko Douji. Already looking kind of androgynous made this relatively easy for him. It's at that point where he meets Takatoshi Hijiyama, who falls in love with "Kiriko".

- After some time, he travels to the 1980s, and is followed by Takatoshi, who discovers his true identity (But is still attracted to him anyway, and so the bisexual crisis commences)

- SPNaTI Okino, regarding 13:SAR's timeline is pre-epilogue but post-endgame. He does return Takatoshi's feelings but since he's not done with his crisis yet, they're not a couple.

- In personality Okino is pretty laidback, if a little shady sometimes. He's not asocial but he's reserved with his own deeper feelings and motivations. He teases people often (People means Takatoshi 2/3 of the time)

Notable / Targetable Facts

- To get it out of the way already. The crossdressing point but **for the love of god don't be weird about it.** He's just a feminine guy. If you're going to target this do it in a way that's more like "male character becomes curious about how it's like to wear a skirt" or "female character and him talk about fashion" or anything else as long as it is not "trap joke number 69420".

- (This doesn't mean your character can't find it odd or confusing or surprising or not be super polite about it, especially if it's in character for them, I just really don't want the trap jokes.)

- Designed a few mechas with the intention of saving his world when he was just a teenager.

- The tech-savvyness in general, his proficiency with programming, engineering, science etc. Might be interesting for other mecha pilot or scientist/programmer characters + The contrast between the hypercompetence and the fact that he looks like a very unassuming small twink.

- Sometimes he'll make assumptions about characters under the belief that he can read them.

- He's pretty confident, everything aside. Feels minimal embarrassment through the game even when he's forfeiting. Will flirt with non-straight male characters in varying levels of subtlelty.

- Not that he's to the level of a perverted or slutty-tagged character but he is in fact horny. Takatoshi's crisis and all the other guys he knows getting with women has Not been kind to him over the last few years.

- ( ^ Resents this but barely talks about it in straightforward terms. This also means he actually doesn't have that much experience even if he acts confident.)

- The whole being in love with Takatoshi "Yakisoba Pan enjoyer first and soldier second" Hijiyama thing (Though if you're going to target this, maybe set it for games where Takatoshi isn't present. Gotta keep the sexual tension alive.)

case.name: Okino's Gender Reveal (No Takatoshi)
case.description: Okino reveals to the table that he's a guy. This happens either when he strips the ribbon or during the start of the game in an all-male table.

case.name: Unlucky Bachelor(ette)s
case.description: Okino wonders if any of the players have also been/are single, while most people they're close to are in relationships.

case.name: i lied i dont like sex now tell me about your research field
case.description: When they're stripping, Okino asks a scientist character about their specialization.

case.name: Wig.
case.description: Okino implies he's about to take off his underwear when losing in his 5th stage, but ends up taking off his wig instead.

case.name: Girl Help
case.description: Okino asks an all-girls table for love advice.

case.name: First time?
case.description: If he's decent when another opponent is exposed, Okino will ask this.

case.name: (Not) First time?
case.description: If another character is decent while Okino is exposed, he will ask this.

case.name: Only gay if you want it to be
case.description: Line Okino says post gender reveal if there are straight men in the table.

notes.note: nov 28 is the date of 13sar's japanese release :'] counts as Kind of a birthday right?
he wants to study her but might end up accidentally riling her up instead
